message.content:
{"id": "2694", "title": "Bug 2694: Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)", "description": "Bug 2694Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE) press Add for the associated editors.
a. Multiple selection could be enabled.
c. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as 'default'.
NOTES:
KLM (10/10/2001 1:54:57 PM) Also:
f. The dialog should have a width hint.
g. The File editors Pref page should not grow in height when selected, unlike other pages.

I currently have fixes for a, c, f. Need to release.
KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) released fixes for a, c, f, g", "OB": "'Add' button adds a hidden entry.", "EB": "Entries already existing in the associated editors list should not be available for selection.", "SR": ""}

Need a width hint for the dialogg. Why does the File editors Pref page grow in height when it is selected, but no other pagesdo the same?I currently have fixes for a, c, fNeed to releaseKLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM)released fixes for a, c, f, g ', 'OB': '', 'EB': "'Add' should not add a hidden entry.d.
